industries.name: Internet Company (Search Engines, Payment Systems, Social Networks, Information and Educational, Entertainment Resources, Website Promotion etc.)
System Integration, Technological and Business Processes Automation, IT Consulting

experience.description:
•	Designing a development DSP kit based on TMS320c6745 (HIAST 2020).
•	5th year project: A planar position control of a steel ball using magnetic field (HIAST 2018).
•	4th year project: Designing and implementation of a monitoring and control system for a DC motor platform connected to a CAN network (2017).

•	Support and guidance system for the blind people (Smart Stick) (AL Andalus University-2022)
•	Design and Development of an Infant Incubator (AL Andalus University-2022).
•	A control device for injecting a liquid into a medical syringe based on IOT technology (AL Andalus University-2022).
•	A fall detection and health status device for the elderly based on IOT (AL Andalus University-2021)
•	Mobile Robot (HIAST 2018).
•	Designing Flyback inverter (HIAST 2017).

•	Volunteer at organization of many ceremonies in HIAST.
•	Participator in EDC(Engineering Design Challenge) Competition in Beirut.

higher.name: Higher Institute of Applied Science and Technology (HIAST)
